resources.string: Welcome to Status Saver! This app helps you easily save and manage status updates from WApp. Learn how to use the app effectively with this guide.

The app has a simple interface with three main sections:

1. Recent Status: View and save recent status updates
2. Saved Status: Access your saved status files
3. Settings: Configure app preferences

To save status images:

1. Open the app and view recent statuses
2. Tap on any image to preview
3. Click the download button to save
4. Find saved images in your gallery

To save status videos:

1. Open the app and switch to video tab
2. Tap on any video to preview
3. Click the download button to save
4. Find saved videos in your gallery

You can manage your saved files by:

1. Going to the Saved tab
2. Long press to select multiple files
3. Use the share or delete options
4. Find all saved files in your gallery

Common issues and solutions:

1. No statuses showing? Grant storage permissions
2. Can't save? Check available storage space
3. App crashes? Clear cache and restart
4. Still having issues? Contact support

This app also supports WApp Business:

1. Works the same way as regular WApp
2. Automatically detects Business statuses
3. Saves to the same location
4. All features work identically
This app needs storage permission to access and save WApp statuses
Android 10 and above requires special permission to access WApp statuses. Please enable \"Allow management of all files\" in the next screen.
This app needs storage access to read WApp statuses and save them. Please grant the permission to continue.
